title: The "fallacies" of decreasing damage by 10%:
body:
**1.) Tanks won't be able to last-hit minions.**
Minons can have 10% less health and 10% more damage resistance to eachother to compensate.  _Boom._

**2.) Champions will still continue to one-shot eachother.**
10% damage resistance will not be enough to save someone that doesn't buy defense from someone else 2+ levels higher that is building pure damage; however in any other situation champions will lose their power to nuke people on their own, especially if any healing is involved. 

**3.) Games will be longer.**
Not if objectives are no harder to take down, if for example towers/monsters had 10% less health and 10% more minion resistance - again, all that needs to be reduced for there to be more varied gameplay is champion-to-champion damage, nothing else.

**4.) Everyone will still run the same dumb rune pages.**
Objectively untrue - many, many runes will be infinitely more valuable than they once were if champions can avoid getting nuked by 1-2 champions and stats can reliably matter past, say, the 20-minute mark.

**5.) Assassins as a role will die.**
Not die, but they will require more teamwork (**gasp**) to do well.  Imagine 2 coordinated assassins/fighters/mages ganking being the norm - doesn't that sound cool?  Cooler than one guy desperately trying to nuke people on their own at least?

**6.) LC$ hypercarries and Big Play$ will cease to exist.**
Faker didn't first become famous in Season 8.  League of Legends as a whole didn't first become famous in Season 8.  Damage isn't what people get excited about.  _Search your feelings, you know it to be true..._

**7.) Riven skins won't sell.**
I'm sure they will.  In fact I'm sure Riot will buff her to compensate no matter the circumstance, no qualms here.

replies.body: Reducing damage by 10% will just utterly break the game in every way.
The game **IS** utterly broken in every way.
Hardly. Breaking it even more is not a solution regardless.
it'll be like season 7 again, already tried that and it wasn't fun.
